title: Docker support for daemon
description:
Create Docker image for running moe-daemon.

**Benefits:**
- Easy deployment
- Consistent environment
- CI/CD friendly

**Deliverables:**
- Dockerfile for daemon
- docker-compose.yml for local dev
- Published image on Docker Hub or GHCR
- Documentation for Docker usage
taskRails: Use multi-stage build for small image size

implementationPlan.description: Create Dockerfile for moe-daemon with multi-stage build (node:alpine). Use multi-stage build for small image size. All docs must work for Windows, Mac, and Linux users.
Create docker-compose.yml for local dev with volume mounts. Scripts must have cross-platform alternatives. Follow GitHub community standards.
Add GitHub Actions workflow to build and publish to GHCR. Semantic versioning for all packages.
Add Docker documentation to README and DEVELOPMENT.md.

reopenReason: Image not published to registry yet. Workflow ready but needs merge to main to trigger publish.
